message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $155 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $165. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $165, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
